I.27. The institution rewards SAS staff for
exceptional job performance.

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
FACULTY STAFF AND STUDENT’S VIRTUAL RECOGNITION PROGRAM
March 4, 2022
The academic year 2020-2021 was successfully ended with students who achieved outstanding scholastic records and Faculty and Staff who showed unremarkable efforts. Cavite State University-Tanza Campus was gladly to recognized the effort and perseverance of the Students, Faculty and Staff, thus a Virtual Recognition Program was
conducted on March 4, 2022 via FB live.
Activity banner posted in the CvSU-Tanza Campus’ Facebook page
Registration announcement posted in the CvSU-Tanza Campus’ Facebook Page

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
It was followed with the presentation of Full and Partial Scholars for Second Semester 2020-2021
Faculty and Staff Awardees were also presented

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
Prof. Mildred A. Sebastian was awarded for Department Heads Category
Mr. Erwin M. Regio was awarded for Department Level

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Ph. 2, Bahay Katuparan, Bagtas, Tanza, Cavite (046) 414-3979 www.cvsu.edu.ph
Ms. Noemi A. Perida, Campus Registrar was awarded for Non Academic Employee
Prepared by: Certified Correct:
EIZEL MAE L. ANGELES MELONA I. SAQUIN Campus Nurse Head, OSAS Date prepared: September 5 , 2022
Noted:
GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator
